short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Json field validator that outputs a story that can be pasted into Slack

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of dealing with JSON blobs overflowing with endless fields?

Looking for a quick, reusable way to verify that your JSON fields have the right values?

This tool makes it easy to validate JSON and clearly communicate the results. Set up reusable criteria to check your JSON, and get a pre-formatted story thatâ€™s ready to paste directly into Slack.

Need to ensure contacts.*.age is set to 22? This tool has you covered.

Does contacts.0.id need a value? Let this tool handle it.

Checking if .contacts.*.hobbies.0 includes "hiking"? Look no further!

Save time, reduce frustration, and validate your JSON with confidence.
